p: In order to evaluate the relationship between the parameters a PCA was performed ( Figure 3). In the GENTA group, SCr, SU, UCr and UU correlated positively with TOS, OSI, NOx, MDA, and Nf-kB, and negatively with SH and TAC. In the CHT groups, the renal function tests were negatively correlated with TOS, OSI, NOx and Nf-kB.
